                          AREA ||i.USART1_IRQHandler||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  USART1_IRQHandler PROC
;;;102    
;;;103    void USART1_IRQHandler(void)                	//串口1中断服务程序
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;104    	{
;;;105    	u8 Res;
;;;106    #if SYSTEM_SUPPORT_OS 		//如果SYSTEM_SUPPORT_OS为真，则需要支持OS.
;;;107    	OSIntEnter();    
;;;108    #endif
;;;109    	if(USART_GetITStatus(USART1, USART_IT_RXNE) != RESET)  //接收中断(接收到的数据必须是0x0d 0x0a结尾)
000002  f2405125          MOV      r1,#0x525
000006  481d              LDR      r0,|L1.124|
000008  f7fffffe          BL       USART_GetITStatus
00000c  b310              CBZ      r0,|L1.84|
;;;110    		{
;;;111    		Res =USART_ReceiveData(USART1);	//读取接收到的数据
00000e  481b              LDR      r0,|L1.124|
000010  f7fffffe          BL       USART_ReceiveData
000014  b2c4              UXTB     r4,r0
;;;112    		
;;;113    		if((USART_RX_STA&0x8000)==0)//接收未完成
000016  481a              LDR      r0,|L1.128|
000018  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; USART_RX_STA
00001a  f4004000          AND      r0,r0,#0x8000
00001e  b9c8              CBNZ     r0,|L1.84|
;;;114    			{
;;;115    			if(USART_RX_STA&0x4000)//接收到了0x0d
000020  4817              LDR      r0,|L1.128|
000022  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; USART_RX_STA
000024  f4004080          AND      r0,r0,#0x4000
000028  b160              CBZ      r0,|L1.68|
;;;116    				{
;;;117    				if(Res!=0x0a)USART_RX_STA=0;//接收错误,重新开始
00002a  2c0a              CMP      r4,#0xa
00002c  d003              BEQ      |L1.54|
00002e  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000030  4913              LDR      r1,|L1.128|
000032  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
000034  e020              B        |L1.120|
                  |L1.54|
;;;118    				else USART_RX_STA|=0x8000;	//接收完成了 
000036  4812              LDR      r0,|L1.128|
000038  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; USART_RX_STA
00003a  f4404000          ORR      r0,r0,#0x8000
00003e  4910              LDR      r1,|L1.128|
000040  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
000042  e019              B        |L1.120|
                  |L1.68|
;;;119    				}
;;;120    			else //还没收到0X0D
;;;121    				{	
;;;122    				if(Res==0x0d)USART_RX_STA|=0x4000;
000044  2c0d              CMP      r4,#0xd
000046  d106              BNE      |L1.86|
000048  480d              LDR      r0,|L1.128|
00004a  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; USART_RX_STA
00004c  f4404080          ORR      r0,r0,#0x4000
000050  490b              LDR      r1,|L1.128|
000052  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
                  |L1.84|
000054  e010              B        |L1.120|
                  |L1.86|
;;;123    				else
;;;124    					{
;;;125    					USART_RX_BUF[USART_RX_STA&0X3FFF]=Res ;
000056  480a              LDR      r0,|L1.128|
000058  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; USART_RX_STA
00005a  f3c0000d          UBFX     r0,r0,#0,#14
00005e  4909              LDR      r1,|L1.132|
000060  540c              STRB     r4,[r1,r0]
;;;126    					USART_RX_STA++;
000062  4807              LDR      r0,|L1.128|
000064  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; USART_RX_STA
000066  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1
000068  4905              LDR      r1,|L1.128|
00006a  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;127    					if(USART_RX_STA>(USART_REC_LEN-1))USART_RX_STA=0;//接收数据错误,重新开始接收	  
00006c  4608              MOV      r0,r1
00006e  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; USART_RX_STA
000070  28c7              CMP      r0,#0xc7
000072  dd01              BLE      |L1.120|
000074  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000076  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
                  |L1.120|
;;;128    					}		 
;;;129    				}
;;;130    			}   		 
;;;131         } 
;;;132    #if SYSTEM_SUPPORT_OS 	//如果SYSTEM_SUPPORT_OS为真，则需要支持OS.
;;;133    	OSIntExit();  											 
;;;134    #endif
;;;135    } 
000078  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;136    #endif	
                          ENDP

00007a  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L1.124|
                          DCD      0x40013800
                  |L1.128|
                          DCD      USART_RX_STA
                  |L1.132|
                          DCD      USART_RX_BUF

                          AREA ||i._sys_exit||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  _sys_exit PROC
;;;19     //定义_sys_exit()以避免使用半主机模式    
;;;20     void _sys_exit(int x) 
000000  bf00              NOP      
;;;21     { 
;;;22     	x = x; 
;;;23     } 
000002  4770              BX       lr
;;;24     //重定义fputc函数 
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.fputc||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  fputc PROC
;;;24     //重定义fputc函数 
;;;25     int fputc(int ch, FILE *f)
000000  bf00              NOP      
                  |L3.2|
;;;26     {      
;;;27     	while((USART1->SR&0X40)==0);//循环发送,直到发送完毕   
000002  4a05              LDR      r2,|L3.24|
000004  8812              LDRH     r2,[r2,#0]
000006  f0020240          AND      r2,r2,#0x40
00000a  2a00              CMP      r2,#0
00000c  d0f9              BEQ      |L3.2|
;;;28         USART1->DR = (u8) ch;      
00000e  b2c2              UXTB     r2,r0
000010  4b01              LDR      r3,|L3.24|
000012  1d1b              ADDS     r3,r3,#4
000014  801a              STRH     r2,[r3,#0]
;;;29     	return ch;
;;;30     }
000016  4770              BX       lr
;;;31     #endif 
                          ENDP

                  |L3.24|
                          DCD      0x40013800

                          AREA ||i.uart_init||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  uart_init PROC
;;;60       
;;;61     void uart_init(u32 bound){
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
000002  b086              SUB      sp,sp,#0x18
000004  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;62       //GPIO端口设置
;;;63       GPIO_InitTypeDef GPIO_InitStructure;
;;;64     	USART_InitTypeDef USART_InitStructure;
;;;65     	NVIC_InitTypeDef NVIC_InitStructure;
;;;66     	 
;;;67     	RCC_APB2PeriphClockCmd(RCC_APB2Periph_USART1|RCC_APB2Periph_GPIOA, ENABLE);	//使能USART1，GPIOA时钟
000006  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
000008  f2440004          MOV      r0,#0x4004
00000c  f7fffffe          BL       RCC_APB2PeriphClockCmd
;;;68       
;;;69     	//USART1_TX   GPIOA.9
;;;70       GPIO_InitStructure.GPIO_Pin = GPIO_Pin_9; //PA.9
000010  f44f7000          MOV      r0,#0x200
000014  f8ad0014          STRH     r0,[sp,#0x14]
;;;71       GPIO_InitStructure.GPIO_Speed = GPIO_Speed_50MHz;
000018  2003              MOVS     r0,#3
00001a  f88d0016          STRB     r0,[sp,#0x16]
;;;72       GPIO_InitStructure.GPIO_Mode = GPIO_Mode_AF_PP;	//复用推挽输出
00001e  2018              MOVS     r0,#0x18
000020  f88d0017          STRB     r0,[sp,#0x17]
;;;73       GPIO_Init(GPIOA, &GPIO_InitStructure);//初始化GPIOA.9
000024  a905              ADD      r1,sp,#0x14
000026  481c              LDR      r0,|L4.152|
000028  f7fffffe          BL       GPIO_Init
;;;74        
;;;75       //USART1_RX	  GPIOA.10初始化
;;;76       GPIO_InitStructure.GPIO_Pin = GPIO_Pin_10;//PA10
00002c  f44f6080          MOV      r0,#0x400
000030  f8ad0014          STRH     r0,[sp,#0x14]
;;;77       GPIO_InitStructure.GPIO_Mode = GPIO_Mode_IN_FLOATING;//浮空输入
000034  2004              MOVS     r0,#4
000036  f88d0017          STRB     r0,[sp,#0x17]
;;;78       GPIO_Init(GPIOA, &GPIO_InitStructure);//初始化GPIOA.10  
00003a  a905              ADD      r1,sp,#0x14
00003c  4816              LDR      r0,|L4.152|
00003e  f7fffffe          BL       GPIO_Init
;;;79     
;;;80       //Usart1 NVIC 配置
;;;81       NVIC_InitStructure.NVIC_IRQChannel = USART1_IRQn;
000042  2025              MOVS     r0,#0x25
000044  f88d0000          STRB     r0,[sp,#0]
;;;82     	NVIC_InitStructure.NVIC_IRQChannelPreemptionPriority=3 ;//抢占优先级3
000048  2003              MOVS     r0,#3
00004a  f88d0001          STRB     r0,[sp,#1]
;;;83     	NVIC_InitStructure.NVIC_IRQChannelSubPriority = 3;		//子优先级3
00004e  f88d0002          STRB     r0,[sp,#2]
;;;84     	NVIC_InitStructure.NVIC_IRQChannelCmd = ENABLE;			//IRQ通道使能
000052  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
000054  f88d0003          STRB     r0,[sp,#3]
;;;85     	NVIC_Init(&NVIC_InitStructure);	//根据指定的参数初始化VIC寄存器
000058  4668              MOV      r0,sp
00005a  f7fffffe          BL       NVIC_Init
;;;86       
;;;87        //USART 初始化设置
;;;88     
;;;89     	USART_InitStructure.USART_BaudRate = bound;//串口波特率
00005e  9401              STR      r4,[sp,#4]
;;;90     	USART_InitStructure.USART_WordLength = USART_WordLength_8b;//字长为8位数据格式
000060  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000062  f8ad0008          STRH     r0,[sp,#8]
;;;91     	USART_InitStructure.USART_StopBits = USART_StopBits_1;//一个停止位
000066  f8ad000a          STRH     r0,[sp,#0xa]
;;;92     	USART_InitStructure.USART_Parity = USART_Parity_No;//无奇偶校验位
00006a  f8ad000c          STRH     r0,[sp,#0xc]
;;;93     	USART_InitStructure.USART_HardwareFlowControl = USART_HardwareFlowControl_None;//无硬件数据流控制
00006e  f8ad0010          STRH     r0,[sp,#0x10]
;;;94     	USART_InitStructure.USART_Mode = USART_Mode_Rx | USART_Mode_Tx;	//收发模式
000072  200c              MOVS     r0,#0xc
000074  f8ad000e          STRH     r0,[sp,#0xe]
;;;95     
;;;96       USART_Init(USART1, &USART_InitStructure); //初始化串口1
000078  a901              ADD      r1,sp,#4
00007a  4808              LDR      r0,|L4.156|
00007c  f7fffffe          BL       USART_Init
;;;97       //USART_ITConfig(USART1, USART_IT_RXNE, ENABLE);//开启串口接受中断
;;;98     	USART_ITConfig(USART1, USART_IT_RXNE, DISABLE);//开启串口接受中断
000080  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
000082  f2405125          MOV      r1,#0x525
000086  4805              LDR      r0,|L4.156|
000088  f7fffffe          BL       USART_ITConfig
;;;99       USART_Cmd(USART1, ENABLE);                    //使能串口1 
00008c  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
00008e  4803              LDR      r0,|L4.156|
000090  f7fffffe          BL       USART_Cmd
;;;100    
;;;101    }
000094  b006              ADD      sp,sp,#0x18
000096  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;102    
                          ENDP

                  |L4.152|
                          DCD      0x40010800
                  |L4.156|
                          DCD      0x40013800

                          AREA ||.bss||, DATA, NOINIT, ALIGN=0

                  USART_RX_BUF
                          %        200

                          AREA ||.data||, DATA, ALIGN=2

                  __stdout
                          DCD      0x00000000
                  USART_RX_STA
000004  0000              DCW      0x0000
